Detailed Description

OverviewSearchReplyPacket.

First the normal SearchMatchReplyPacket header, then the reply packet contains: {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Description \ REPLY_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & number of matches \ +4 & 4 bytes & length of data \ SEARCH_REPLY_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & the total number of masks \ +4 & 4 bytes & uniqueOrFull bitmask \ OVERVIEW_SEARCH_REPLY_HEADER_SIZE & x bytes & the matches \ {tabular}

The matches look like: {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Description \ REPLY_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & number of matches \ +4 & 4 bytes & length of data \ S_R_H_S & 4 bytes & the total number of masks \ OVERVIEW_S_R_H_S & 4 bytes & mapID \ +4 & 4 bytes & mask \ +4 & 4 bytes & itemID \ +4 & x bytes & name (as char *) \ {tabular}
